# ([[땅]] 곤, ''ttang-'') [[earth]]
# ([[곤괘]] 곤, ''gongwae-'') {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☷}} or the eighth of the [[Eight Trigrams]], ({{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☰☱☲☳☴☵☶☷}} or [[팔괘]] ([[w:Ba gua (concept)|八卦]], ''palgwae'')) that exactly match with the three-digit binary numbers, counting from 0 to 7. Four (0, 2, 5, 7) out of eight trigrams are placed in the four corners of the [[w:flag of South Korea|flag of South Korea]].
